A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was so disappointed with how they set up little sub plots in TFA but totally ignored them in TLJ! Changed Luke’s character completely and far too many misplaced jokes! The pacing of the movie was all wrong! An hour in I was bored! The film dragged for me! The director could have made this an epic but decided to ignore the last film and set up his own trilogy after this one! I’m not looking forward to episode 9! I’ve never walked out of a Star Wars film and felt it was boring! Sad times!
